XI.ii.3.C.1.f
.
Request for Substitution Time Limits
A person may not substitute for a deceased claimant unless the person files a request to substitute no later than one year after the claimant's death.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section C  - Development for Accrued and Requests for Substitution
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section C
